img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker
![Breath Of Fire .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Breath_Of_Fire_.jpg)| Breath Of Fire| Epic | Using the gourd significantly increases attack for the next Unveiling Strike in Cloud Step for a short duration | Defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island (secret boss) in The New West (requires Loong Scales) | Breath Of Fire
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear
![Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/57/Black-myth-wukong-steel-ginseng.jpg)| Steel Ginseng| Rare | Using the gourd, instantly gains a moderate amount of Focus | Randomly obtained from Aged Ginseng plants | Steel Ginseng

img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a rare or epic artifact. Based on the preceding and following text, it is part of a guide detailing various gourd-related items and their effects. These items enhance gameplay by granting buffs such as extended spell durations, increased attack power, defense boosts, or focus restoration. The artifact shown appears to be a collectible or consumable tied to the game's narrative or mechanics.
